Name: Kumquat (PH)
Description: A cold-hardy citrus that closely resembles an orange. These olive-sized fruits are eaten with the peel and are sometimes used in fruit salads.

DescriptionLocalization.es: A cold-hardy citrus that closely resembles an orange. These olive-sized fruits are eaten with the peel and are sometimes used in fruit salads.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: A cold-hardy citrus that closely resembles an orange. These olive-sized fruits are eaten with the peel and are sometimes used in fruit salads.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Eine kältebeständige Zitrusfrucht, die einer Orange sehr ähnelt. Diese olivengroßen Früchte werden mit der Schale gegessen und manchmal in Obstsalaten verwendet.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: A cold-hardy citrus that closely resembles an orange. These olive-sized fruits are eaten with the peel and are sometimes used in fruit salads.

DescriptionLocalization.pt: A cold-hardy citrus that closely resembles an orange. These olive-sized fruits are eaten with the peel and are sometimes used in fruit salads.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Холодостойкий фрукт, очень похожий на апельсин. Плоды размером со сливу едят вместе с кожурой и иногда используют во фруктовых салатах.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: A cold-hardy citrus that closely resembles an orange. These olive-sized fruits are eaten with the peel and are sometimes used in fruit salads.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 一种耐寒的柑橘，与橘子非常相似。这些橄榄大小的水果连皮一起吃，有时也用在水果沙拉中。
